00027 #ifndef HASHTAB_H
00028 #define HASHTAB_H
00029 
00030 #include "system.h"
00031 #include "pthread-wrapper.h"
00032 
00034 enum insert
00035 {
00036   NO_INSERT = 0,
00037   INSERT
00038 };
00039 
00041 typedef unsigned int hash_t;
00042 
00044 typedef hash_t (*htab_hash) (const void *x);
00045 
00047 typedef int (*htab_eq) (const void *x, const void *y);
00048 
00050 typedef void (*htab_del) (void *x);
00051 
00053 typedef struct htab_def
00054 {
00056   void **table;
00057 
00059   unsigned int size;
00060 
00062   unsigned int n_elements;
00063 
00065   unsigned int n_deleted;
00066 
00068   htab_hash hash_f;
00069 
00071   htab_eq eq_f;
00072 
00074   htab_del del_f;
00075 
00077   pthread_mutex_t *mutex;
00078 } *htab_t;
00079 
00080 extern void htab_expand (htab_t htab);
00081 extern htab_t htab_create (unsigned int size, htab_hash hash_f, htab_eq eq_f,
00082                            htab_del del_f, pthread_mutex_t *mutex);
00083 extern void htab_destroy (htab_t htab);
00084 extern void htab_empty (htab_t htab);
00085 extern void htab_clear_slot (htab_t htab, void **slot);
00086 extern void *htab_find (htab_t htab, const void *elem);
00087 extern void *htab_find_with_hash (htab_t htab, const void *elem, hash_t hash);
00088 extern void **htab_find_slot (htab_t htab, const void *elem,
00089                               enum insert insert);
00090 extern void **htab_find_slot_with_hash (htab_t htab, const void *elem,
00091                                         hash_t hash, enum insert insert);
00092 
00094 #define EMPTY_ENTRY ((void *) 0)
00095 
00097 #define DELETED_ENTRY ((void *) 1)
00098 
00100 #define HTAB_FOR_EACH_SLOT(HTAB, SLOT)                                  \
00101   CHECK_MUTEX_LOCKED ((HTAB)->mutex);                                   \
00102   if (((HTAB)->n_elements - (HTAB)->n_deleted) * 8 < (HTAB)->size)      \
00103     htab_expand ((HTAB));                                               \
00104   for ((SLOT) = (HTAB)->table;                                          \
00105        (SLOT) < (HTAB)->table + (HTAB)->size;                           \
00106        (SLOT)++)                                                        \
00107     if (*(SLOT) != EMPTY_ENTRY && *(SLOT) != DELETED_ENTRY)
00108 
00109 #ifdef ENABLE_CHECKING
00110 
00112 #define HTAB_CHECK_SLOT(HTAB, SLOT)                             \
00113   if (1)                                                        \
00114     {                                                           \
00115       hash_t hash_ = (*(HTAB)->hash_f) (*(SLOT));               \
00116       unsigned int size_ = (HTAB)->size;                        \
00117       unsigned int index_ = hash_ % size_;                      \
00118       unsigned int step_ = 1 + hash_ % (size_ - 2);             \
00119                                                                 \
00120       while (&(HTAB)->table[index_] != (SLOT))                  \
00121         {                                                       \
00122           if ((HTAB)->table[index_] == EMPTY_ENTRY              \
00123               || (HTAB)->table[index_] == *(SLOT))              \
00124             abort ();                                           \
00125                                                                 \
00126           index_ += step_;                                      \
00127           if (index_ >= size_)                                  \
00128             index_ -= size_;                                    \
00129         }                                                       \
00130     }
00131 
00133 #define HTAB_CHECK(HTAB)                                        \
00134   if (1)                                                        \
00135     {                                                           \
00136       void **slot_;                                             \
00137                                                                 \
00138       HTAB_FOR_EACH_SLOT ((HTAB), slot_)                        \
00139         {                                                       \
00140           HTAB_CHECK_SLOT ((HTAB), slot_);                      \
00141         }                                                       \
00142     }
00143 
00144 #else
00145 
00147 #define HTAB_CHECK_SLOT(HTAB, SLOT)
00148 
00150 #define HTAB_CHECK(HTAB)
00151 
00152 #endif
00153 
00154 #endif
